types.name: ArrayJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches array schemas.

types.name: ArrayJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.ArraySchema" />.

types.name: DateJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches int schemas with date logical types.

types.name: DateJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DateLogicalType" />.

types.name: DecimalJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches bytes or fixed schemas with decimal logical types.

types.name: DecimalJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DecimalLogicalType" />.

types.name: DefaultJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches all unhandled names.

types.name: DurationJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches fixed schemas with duration logical types.

types.name: DurationJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.DurationLogicalType" />.

types.name: EnumJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches enum schemas.

types.name: EnumJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.EnumSchema" />.

types.name: FixedJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches fixed schemas.

types.name: FixedJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.FixedSchema" />.

types.name: IJsonSchemaReader
types.summary: Reads an Avro schema from JSON.

types.name: IJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary:
Reads Avro schemas from specific JSON tokens. Used by <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Representation.JsonSchemaReader" /> to
            break apart read logic.

types.name: IJsonSchemaWriter
types.summary: Writes an Avro schema to JSON.

types.name: IJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary:
Writes specific Avro schemas to JSON. Used by <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Representation.JsonSchemaWriter" /> to break apart
            write logic.

types.name: INewtonsoftJsonSchemaReader
types.summary: Reads an Avro schema from JSON using <see cref="N:Newtonsoft.Json" /> components.

types.name: INewtonsoftJsonSchemaWriter
types.summary: Writes an Avro schema to JSON using <see cref="N:Newtonsoft.Json" /> components.

types.name: ISchemaReader
types.summary: Reads an Avro schema from a serialized representation.

types.name: ISchemaWriter
types.summary: Writes an Avro schema to a serialized representation.

types.name: JsonAttributeToken
types.summary: JSON object keys defined by the Avro spec.

types.name: JsonSchemaReader
types.summary: A customizable JSON schema reader backed by a list of cases.

types.name: JsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A base JSON schema reader case.

types.name: JsonSchemaToken
types.summary: Schema types defined by the Avro spec.

types.name: JsonSchemaWriter
types.summary: A customizable JSON schema writer backed by a list of cases.

types.name: JsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A base JSON schema writer case.

types.name: MapJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches map schemas.

types.name: MapJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MapSchema" />.

types.name: MicrosecondTimeJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches long schemas with microsecond time logical types.

types.name: MicrosecondTimeJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MicrosecondTimeLogicalType" />.

types.name: MicrosecondTimestampJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches long schemas with microsecond timestamp logical types.

types.name: MicrosecondTimestampJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MicrosecondTimestampLogicalType" />.

types.name: MillisecondTimeJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches int schemas with millisecond time logical types.

types.name: MillisecondTimeJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MillisecondTimeLogicalType" />.

types.name: MillisecondTimestampJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches long schemas with microsecond time logical types.

types.name: MillisecondTimestampJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.MillisecondTimestampLogicalType" />.

types.name: NamedJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case with shared functions to extract fields from named schemas.

types.name: PrimitiveJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches all <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.PrimitiveSchema" /> subclasses.

types.name: RecordJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches record schemas.

types.name: RecordJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.RecordSchema" />.

types.name: UnionJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches union schemas.

types.name: UnionJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UnionSchema" />.

types.name: UnknownSchemaException
types.summary: The exception that is thrown when a schema representation cannot be parsed.

types.name: UuidJsonSchemaReaderCase
types.summary: A JSON schema reader case that matches string schemas with UUID logical types.

types.name: UuidJsonSchemaWriterCase
types.summary: A JSON schema writer case that matches <see cref="T:Chr.Avro.Abstract.UuidLogicalType" />.
